summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1548, for the improvement of Madison Street in the City of Seattle, from 1st Avenue to 2nd Avenue, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation; with granite curbs and by laying such additions to the existing sewer and water main systems as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 16707 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
